salaryExpectations: LKR 100,000 (Data Analyst) to LKR 800,000+ (Lead Data Scientist) per month.
futureOutlook: This is one of the fastest-growing and highest-paying fields in Sri Lanka's IT sector. As more companies become data-driven, the demand for professionals who can extract actionable insights from data will soar. Specializations in AI, Natural Language Processing (NLP), and Big Data engineering are the future.
